text: Suardi is a comune in the Province of Pavia in the Lombardy region in Italy. It is about 60 km southwest of Milan and about 35 km southwest of Pavia. As of 31 December 2004, 692 people lived there. It has an area of 9.8 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Suardi is next to these municipalities: Bassignana, Frascarolo, Gambarana, Valenza. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.8) id:sfondo value:rgb(1,1,1)
